content: have fun creating this stylish pair of earrings for yourself or as a gift to your friends and family you can have last-minute earrings in one hour if you use multicoloured threads change colour between row or even sew the motifs with different colours you will have your one of a kind earrings to match your favourite outfits this pattern is tested and ready for you materials cotton thread suitable for 1 5mm hook for this pattern i used maxi sugar rush from scheepjes hook 1 5mm scissors 2 earring hooks 4 jump rings - 5mm diameter bent chain nose pliers or any pliers that you can use to open and close the rings finished size approx 4cm long 2 5cm wide the largest part difficulty level beginners with experience with crochet thread stitch guide us terms right handed you can also check the free version in my blog here https //www myindycraft com/crochet-drops-earrings-free-pattern returns/refunds as this is an instant download i cannot issue any refunds after you have received it you are welcome to sell gift or donate your finished items from this pattern but if you are selling/advertising online please credit me as the designer do not copy/re-distribute this pattern please do not use my images to sell your work
